pr_title: Migrate Search Live Testing to Use a Single Service Instance

timeline.message: Update Search tests to use single resource
Update some test code, add container creation to template
Updated some tests to cleanup after their run
Update more tests to track and delete resources
Moving some testing code, fixed deletion of wrong resource type
Finish updating tests and re-recording playback records
Fix linting issue, re-record a few failing tests

timeline.bodyText: Is it better to clean up the indexesToCleanup after test or re-initiate before run?
timeline.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText: I think it would be better to cleanup after the test, this makes it so the test itself maintains all the logic it uses.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText:
Same here.
I have concern which the list has more sources than expected and throw no resource error.
timeline.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText: The concern is that this list would contain more data sources than still existing after the test? Luckily it appears 404 is a valid response type, so it won't throw an exception.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.author: sima-zhu

timeline.message: Fix default Storage suffix, make azure-test-watcher a test dependency as it should be
Add missing '.' in Search service endpoint
Use Free SKU instead of Basic
